title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Understanding and Applying the Role of Instructional Designers in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Explain the primary roles and responsibilities of instructional designers in higher education settings.
Analyze key conflicts in the instructional design process (role confusion, workload overload, etc.) using activity theory-based research findings.
Develop collaboration strategies between instructional designers and instructors when designing blended learning for science subjects.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
